item.title: Douglas add a quote by Virgil
item.description: "Audaces fortuna iuvat (latin)- Fortune favors the bold." -- Virgil

item.title: Douglas add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "Things may come to those who wait, but only the things left by those who hustle." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Douglas add a quote by Anthony Robbins
item.description: "Why live an ordinary life, when you can live an extraordinary one." -- Anthony Robbins

item.title: Douglas add a quote by Anthony Robbins
item.description: "Its not about the goal. Its about growing to become the person that can accomplish that goal." -- Anthony Robbins

item.title: Douglas add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "Reality continues to ruin my life." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Douglas add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "A man who won't die for something is not fit to live." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Douglas add a quote by Chris Rock
item.description: "You know the world is going crazy when the best rapper is a white guy, the best golfer is a black guy, the tallest guy in the NBA is Chinese, the Swiss hold the America's Cup, France is accusing the U.S. of arrogance, Germany doesn't want to go to war, and the three most powerful men in America are named "Bush", "Dick", and "Colin." Need I say more?" -- Chris Rock

item.title: Douglas add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Douglas add a quote by Abigail Van Buren
item.description: "The best index to a person's character is how he treats people who can't do him any good, and how he treats people who can't fight back." -- Abigail Van Buren

item.title: Douglas add a quote by Stephanie Klein
item.description: "Tell the truth, or someone will tell it for you." -- Stephanie Klein

item.title: Douglas add a quote by Charlie Schultz
item.description: "Sometimes I lie awake at night, and I ask, 'Where have I gone wrong'. Then a voice says to me, 'This is going to take more than one night." -- Charlie Schultz

item.title: Douglas add a quote by Simon and Garfunkel
item.description: "I've got nothing to do today but smile." -- Simon and Garfunkel

item.title: Douglas add a quote by Oprah Winfrey
item.description: "The biggest adventure you can ever take is to live the life of your dreams." -- Oprah Winfrey

item.title: Douglas add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "Most men lead lives of quiet desperation and go to the grave with the song still in them." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Douglas add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "No matter how careful you are, there's going to be the sense you missed something, the collapsed feeling under your skin that you didn't experience it all. There's that fallen heart feeling that you rushed right through the moments where you should've been paying attention. Well, get used to that feeling. That's how your whole life will feel some day. This is all practice." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Douglas add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "Our lives are not as limited as we think they are; the world is a wonderfully weird place; consensual reality is significantly flawed; no institution can be trusted, but love does work; all things are possible; and we all could be happy and fulfilled if we only had the guts to be truly free and the wisdom to shrink our egos and quit taking ourselves so damn seriously." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Douglas add a quote by Helen Keller
item.description: "Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much" -- Helen Keller

item.title: Douglas add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "Courage is the most important of all the virtues because without courage, you can't practice any other virtue consistently." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Douglas add a quote by Marie Curie
item.description: "Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to be understood. Now is the time to understand more, so that we may fear less." -- Marie Curie

item.title: Douglas add a quote by Oprah Winfrey
item.description: "The more you praise and celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate." -- Oprah Winfrey

item.title: Douglas add a quote by Oliver James
item.description: "why are trying so hard to fit in, when you're born to stand out" -- Oliver James

item.title: Douglas add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "The past has no power over the present moment." -- Eckhart Tolle

item.title: Douglas add a quote by Oprah Winfrey
item.description: "You can have it all. Just not all at once." -- Oprah Winfrey

item.title: Douglas add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until it's in hot water." -- Eleanor Roosevelt
